name: Basketball Rivals
description:
The World's best 1v1 Real-Time Online Multiplayer Basketball game on Mobile - BASKETBALL RIVALS.

Dunk, Steal, Jab, Drive, Fake & Block on your friends!
The only Mobile basketball game where you do - DUNK ON YOUR FRIENDS.

GO FROM SCRUB TO LEGEND - LEVEL UP
Do you have what it takes to SLAM DUNK up the weekly leaderboards?
Compete Worldwide with other Super Star Ballers and battle for Weekly Killer Rewards.
Level up your player to unlock better rewards & prizes

REALISTIC 3D GRAPHICS
Realistic physics and high quality Graphics, fully customizable 3D Avatar with hundreds of options, PLUS Day & Nighttime Environments

DO IT WITH STYLE!
Unlock all of your POWER DUNKS - Rare, Epic & Legendary Moves.
Upgradeable and customizable dunks to take down your opponent
As you move up the ranks, unlock and upgrade you dunks to dominate the courts. Tomahawk, 360 Spins, and fly through the air like the greatest of all time. Don’t just beat your rivals - do it with style!

GEAR AFFECTS GAMEPLAY
Equip Gear to increase your Players Offense and Defensive power
7 Stats to Modify to POWER UP your player

1-ON-1 REAL-TIME ONLINE MULTIPLAYER
Play against your friends and rivals from around the globe with this real-time synchronous multiplayer basketball game! Try to out juke and ankle break your way to the hole.

KEY FEATURES
Insane 3D Graphics & Physics
Real-time 1 on 1 Synchronous Multiplayer
15 Upgradable Dunks
37+ Custom Basketball with unique Special FX
Over 900 Customization Items
7 Stats to modify with your gear
Weekly Leaderboards & Division Tournaments
Daily Quests
Easy to Play, Mad Skills to Master
Free To Play!

Requirement: iPhone 5s or higher and requires an internet connection to play.
